reviewText: MY COPY HAVE NO AUDIO CHECK THIS WEN BUYING THE DVD MUST BE WITHOUT SOUND MANUFACTURED DEFAULT

I had researched information relating to the Merkaba meditation and was hoping that this video (Holistic Highway to Wisdom) would provide me with a step by step instructional, only to find that this man (David Hulse D.D.) was pitching tuning forks and other merchandise along with workshop formats.  At the end there is a short meditation but certainly not something that a beginner would be able to use, nor the information necessary to follow up etc.  I suppose I thought that this CD would instruct me on the Merkaba, its meditations, and uses; I was very wrong!
